entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
